title: New Liquid Chromatography Columns and Accessories: What to Know for 2023 - LCGC Chromatography Online
summary: This article reviews new liquid chromatography (LC) columns and accessories released in 2022 and 2023. The focus is on advancements in column technology, including superficially porous particle (SPP) substrates, new surface chemistries, and nontraditional column formats. The article also highlights the growing trend towards inert column hardware, designed to minimize interactions with analytes and improve reproducibility.

title: LABVOLUTION 2023: A Sneak Peek into the Future of Laboratory Technology - DirectIndustry e-Magazine
summary: LABVOLUTION, a European trade fair for innovative laboratory equipment, will take place in Hannover, Germany, from May 9th to May 11th. This year's event will focus on digitalization, automation, innovative laboratory technologies, and solutions, as well as artificial intelligence and sustainability. The event will feature a smartLAB exhibit showcasing the connected laboratory of the future, a LAB Sustainability Summit, and a number of premieres, including a new communication standard called LADS.

title: Bisera Lozanovska enters the world of cosmetics and beauty through biochemistry - Fairleigh Dickinson University
summary: Bisera Lozanovska, a biochemistry graduate from Fairleigh Dickinson University, will be joining Cosmax USA as a junior cosmetic chemist. Her passion for cosmetic science and research led her to pursue a career in this field. She has been working part-time at Cosmax since January and will continue her studies in the 4+1 B.S./M.S. program in biochemistry and cosmetic science at FDU.

title: Top 10 Best Speciality Chemicals Companies In India In 2023 - Inventiva
summary: The Indian speciality chemicals industry is booming, with many leading companies producing high-quality products and innovating in areas such as pharmaceuticals, agrochemicals, dyes, and intermediates. The government supports this industry with incentives and research, and companies are focusing on exports to expand their reach. This sector is crucial for the Indian economy, contributing to growth and development.

title: Top 50 Most Innovative Companies Of The World In 2023 - Inventiva
summary: The Boston Consulting Group (BCG) has published its annual report on the top 50 most innovative companies across the globe, highlighting their focus on innovation and addressing major challenges facing humanity.
